channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Avaya Aura® System Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Avaya Aura® System Platform

item.title: CVE-2018-15616|2024-08-05T10:01:53.739Z -- avaya -- avaya%20aura%C2%AE%20system%20platform
item.description: A vulnerability in the Web UI component of Avaya Aura System Platform could allow a remote, unauthenticated user to perform a targeted deserialization attack that could result in remote code execution. Affected versions of System Platform includes 6.3.0 through 6.3.9 and 6.4.0 through 6.4.2.
